column3: Who made the change on a PNR and date/time of change - this can be related to segment changes, (create/cancel/change), ticket issuance, SSR, RMs
column4: Who made the change - base don guest access and OID
column5: Check cancelled segments for flown? Has it been cancelled by airline or agent?
column7: how was the trip booked - agent or online booking tool like Cliqbook, concur
column9: If this was agent booked time and date stamp on when the booking was started.
column12: Any agent involvement after the online booking was ticket or created.
column13: Was this just air or air, hotel or air, hotel and car?
column14: If it was a air booking was the ticket a non-refundable or refundable?
